About United Bank of Africa

Your Trusted
Banking Partner

United Bank of Africa operates with a commitment to excellence, serving individuals, businesses, and organizations. We bring world-class banking to you, supporting trade, business growth, and financial sustainability.

Decades of Banking
Excellence

For years, we have delivered superior financial services to individuals, businesses, governments, and global organizations. Our wide range of products and services meets the needs of millions of retail clients seeking savings, security and financial inclusion.

We serve global businesses requiring sophisticated trade finance solutions. Our ability to combine last-mile payments with global FX and treasury products makes us the partner of choice for anyone seeking global solutions with local execution.

ðŸŽ¯ Our Purpose

What Drives Us

Our vision, mission, and strategy guide everything we do

Our Vision

To be the undisputed leading and dominant financial services institution in our region.

Our Mission

To be a role model by creating superior value for all our stakeholders through excellence.

Our Strategy

Our strategy revolves around innovation, customer-centricity and sustainable growth.

Our History

United Bank of Africa was established with a vision to transform banking. Over the years, we have evolved significantly, becoming one of the leading banks offering innovative services.

Awards and Achievements

United Bank of Africa remains at the forefront of innovation in the financial services industry and has received numerous awards and accolades in recognition of its excellence.

Leadership

Meet our board of directors and senior management comprising our Chair, Non-Executive Directors and Executive Directors.

CEO's Overview

At United Bank of Africa, our CEO is committed to excellence and innovation. We focus on customer satisfaction, technological advancement, and sustainable growth.

Our Strategy

At United Bank of Africa, our strategy is guided by a deep commitment to delivering value to our customers, shareholders, and communities.

Global Presence

With branches in key financial centres across the region, we bring our innovative banking services to a diverse and international clientele.
